channel.title: Please help me guys!
channel.description:
I recently downloaded JDK 6 Update to be able to run bach files, and i've installed it. However i still get the 'javac ist recognised as an... BLAH BLAH you get the idea. I assume i need to make adjustments to my Environment Variables. If anyone can supply me with what i need to type, in the exact path, please do so :D :D
Also, can someone give me the link to the tutorial that Mod Tahorock made that supports my problem?
EDIT: I fixed that, but i'm getting the errror...
javac: *.java file not found. ANY IDEAS? :)
